page.title: 04Education / Health
page.content:
They pay Â£24.00 a week towards costs. The centre has a staff of 8. { { 3 KINGDOWN PLAYGROUP. The playgroup is on 5 mornings a week between 9:30-12:20 pm. There are 18 children who pay Â£1 a morning and 8 toddlers who pay 70p.They do painting, modelling and playing. The children are mainly from Kingsdown with a few from Walmer. {HEALTH
There are four doctors living in Kingsdown but do not practice here. There is a physiotherapist who lives in Kingsdown but works in Deal.There is one dentist who also lives in Kingsdown but he works in Deal. The nearest health centre and hospital are at Deal.
